subject: MX5 United – AM Champion with Simsonn
description_text:
Hi Simsonn team,
My name is Adrien Lugnot, I’m a sim racer competing in the MX5 United iRacing league. A few weeks ago I contacted you to ask for permission to run your logo on my car. I’ve now finished the 2025 season as AM class champion.
I was very proud to achieve this title using your pedals and carrying the Simsonn logo on my car throughout the season. It felt great to represent your brand on track.
I will continue this adventure in Season 3 of MX5 United and I’m looking forward to racing again with your pedals and your logo on my car.
Best regards,
Adrien Lugnot
? 0695204443
✉️ adrien082002@hotmail.fr
